scripts.electon-repair-sqlite3: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && npm run prepublish && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.2-linux-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=1.2.2 --arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.2-linux-x64
